name: Montassar Laribi
bioDescription: I have 2+ years of experience in designing, developing, testing and deploying web apps from scratch. Proven ability in optimizing web performance and implementing SSR solutions out of the box. And also 1+ year of experience as a university professor where I mainly hundle teams of futur engineers in their most important university projects. As well as teach basic and advanced web technologies.

items.school: Ecole Sup. Privée de l'Ingénieurie et de Technologies ESPRIT
items.title: University Professor, Web department
items.description: Teaching at ESPRIT in the web department where I coach and manage team of engineers in their most important projects. I also teach SOA (Service Oriented Architecture), HTML/CSS/JavaScript, NodeJS and ReactJS

items.school: Ecole Sup. Privée de l'Ingénieurie et de Technologies ESPRIT
items.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
items.description: It started as my mandatory graduation internship then I got recruted as a developer and a professor in the university. My first project was the university's website www.esprit.tn made with React and NestJS.

items.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
items.description: I started a small business "Corticali" where I took commissions and made websites and apps for various clients.

items.title: Full-Stack Developer in .NET/C#
items.description: Designing, developing and testing an ERP web app, as well as consulting on ERPs such as Sage and Ciel. I also managed interns.

items.title: Graduation Project .NET/XAMARIN
items.description: I made prototype for an ERP working on a .NET/XAMARIN Stack, going through all the phases of the project.

items.title: ERP/BI Internship
items.description: Creating dashboards and dynamic reporting views with a variaty of tools such as Business Objects, Excel and SQL Server Reporting-Tools.

items.title: Software development Internship
items.description: I made a service using C# that synchronize multiple databases, handeling duplications.
